thread.title: Jets hire Kevin Greene to coach outside linebackers
thread.title_full: Jets hire Kevin Greene to coach outside linebackers

author: Darin Gantt
title: Jets hire Kevin Greene to coach outside linebackers
text:
5 Responses to “Jets hire Kevin Greene to coach outside linebackers” joetoronto says: Jan 27, 2017 4:53 PM 
Dude was a nightmare, an absolute nightmare. Jan 27, 2017 4:56 PM 
Nobody can dislike this move, right? Jan 27, 2017 4:56 PM 
Awesome hire! Jan 27, 2017 5:00 PM 
Was hoping he was going to end up back in Pittsburgh and replace Porter. Jan 27, 2017 5:01 PM 
So, there may have been some falling out with Greene and the Packers after all… 
Clay had his best years with Greene coaching him. Congrats J-E-T-S Leave a Reply
